name: Office Action Response
description: Response to USPTO office action with amendments and arguments

requiredFields.name: Office Action Mailed Date
requiredFields.description: Date the office action was mailed

requiredFields.name: Claims to Amend
requiredFields.description: List claims and brief description of amendments

sections.title: Header
Introduction
sections.content:
Commissioner for Patents
P.O. Box 1450
Alexandria, VA 22313-1450

Dear Sir:

In response to the Office Action mailed {{date office_action_date "MMMM DD, YYYY"}}, please consider the following amendments and remarks.

sections.title: Amendments to the Claims

prompts.system: You are a patent attorney formatting claim amendments in USPTO-compliant format. Use underlining for additions and [brackets] for deletions.

sections.title: Status of Claims
sections.content:
STATUS OF THE CLAIMS

Claims {{claims_rejected}} were rejected in the Office Action.
{{#if claims_to_amend}}Claims [AMENDED CLAIM NUMBERS] have been amended.{{/if}}
No claims have been cancelled.
No new claims have been added.
Claims [ALL CLAIMS] are currently pending.

sections.title: Interview Summary
sections.content:
EXAMINER INTERVIEW

An interview was conducted with Examiner {{examiner_name}} on {{date interview_date "MMMM DD, YYYY"}}. During the interview, the Examiner indicated that [SUMMARY OF AGREEMENTS/SUGGESTIONS]. The amendments presented herein are consistent with the interview discussion.

sections.title: Response to Rejections

prompts.system: You are a patent attorney crafting persuasive arguments to overcome USPTO rejections. Focus on technical distinctions and legal precedent.
prompts.user: Create detailed arguments distinguishing the claims from {{prior_art_references}} for these rejections: {{rejection_types}}

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content:
CONCLUSION

In view of the foregoing amendments and remarks, Applicant respectfully submits that all claims are in condition for allowance. Applicant believes that no outstanding issues remain, and respectfully requests that the Examiner indicate allowance of the application at the earliest convenience.

If the Examiner believes that a telephone interview would expedite prosecution of this application, the Examiner is invited to contact the undersigned at the telephone number provided below.

sections.title: Signature
sections.content:
Respectfully submitted,
